questions: Name any two thermoplastic and thermosetting plastics.
answers: Thermoplastic – Polyethene, PVC Thermosetting – Melamine, Bakellite.

questions: Name the material that is used to make ropes for rock climbing.
Why terylene is a popular polyester ?
answers: Because it can be drawn into very fine fibre that can be woven like any other yarn.

answers: It resists fire and can tolerate heat better than plastic.
